|ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8019AS; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:02:A5 |oui = 00:60:B3 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = b |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = |defaultssid = ConnectionPoint |defaultssid_regex = ^ConnectionPoint$ |default_ch = |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 05/08/2001 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 720591857974 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00006BB6J |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Z-Com XI-300 |rad1modif = PCMCIA (16-bit) |rad1chip1 = Harris;HFA3841; |rad1chip2 = Intersil;; |rad1chip3 = Intersil;; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-MMCX |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The Getting Started Guide included with the unit shows the device with a Delta Networks MAC (00:30:AB). The board design and P/N clearly indicates that '''Delta Networks''' is indeed the OEM. :The board is highly similar to the [[IBM High Rate Wireless LAN Gateway (DR-E200W)]] and the [[Netgear MR314]]. 10/100 LAN switch, 10 WAN "2976161003" is silkscreened on the board.
"D212517430306 5508002713 REV: 0" and "CP-2W" is printed on a label affixed to the LAN port casing. This device most likely uses a '''Marvell''' 88E6050 switch like the [[Netgear MR314]] and the [[IBM High Rate Wireless LAN Gateway (DR-E200W)]]. The power adapter included with the unit is a AD48-1201200DU (12V, 1.2A). {{WiFiCert|W000580|05/13/2002}} ==Links of Interest== [http://h10025.www1.hp.com/ewfrf/wc/manualCategory?cc=us&lc=en&dlc=en&document=&product=218413 Manuals] ==Pictures==
